ComicInfo.Summary:
Detectives Jeremiah Brock and Lisa Ramsey recently saved the lives of four innocents that had been kidnapped by Robert Shayes, the dentist-serial killer terrorizing Los Angeles.
Having identified the murderer, they tracked down Shayes to an old, abandoned fallout shelter off Broadway. A gunfight ensued and Shayes was wounded, but ultimately escaped capture. The detectives then discovered four tortured victims strapped to dentist chairs and wired with explosives. A SWAT team successfully removed the devices and reunited the victims with their families.
Shayes went into hiding and his grisly exploits were detailed in the media and he joined the FBI's Most Wanted List. Now, a new body has been found and a young woman has gone missing. However, these two cases appear unrelated to Shayes and the detectives fear that a new serial killer is involved.
